vajezatha_2935.name: Vajezatha
vajezatha_2935.bio: Purity; worthy of honour, one of Haman’s sons, whom the Jews slew in the palace of Shushan ([Esther 9:9](/esth#Esth.9.9)).

vashti_2937.name: Vashti
vashti_2937.bio: Beautiful, the queen of Ahasuerus, who was deposed from her royal dignity because she refused to obey the king when he desired her to appear in the banqueting hall of Shushan the palace ([Esther 1:10-12](/esth#Esth.1.10)).
